FuncDef: This command enables the system to keep records of CHILD-SA keys for the correspondingipsec-gworipsec-tunnel. There is a system wide limit of maximum number of IPsec tunnels that save keys. If the number of tunnel exceeds that limit, the system will not save keys for the new tunnels. Check with Nokia support for details of the limitation.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of recent records. Values-1 to 48.
